name: Milvus Compare Indexes Concept (Node)
description: Concept: outline commands for comparing IVF_PQ vs HNSW vs DiskANN (no execution).

files.template:
# Milvus Index Comparison (Concept)

- Create IVF_PQ, HNSW, DiskANN on same collection.
- Measure recall@k and latency for a fixed query set.
- Tune params: nlist/m for IVF_PQ, M/efConstruction for HNSW, defaults for DiskANN.
- Record results in a table.
